Text: FW Resume John E Mc Kinleyhere is Johns resume and a cover letter I have read the resume and it looks impressive Let me know what you think Jason Original Message From John E McKinley ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJohnEEMcKinleyCjohnFeFmckinleyhotmailEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June AM To Sokolov Jason Cc Subject Resume John E Mc Kinley Jason I enjoyed meeting you and Connie at Kates loft gathering this weekend and very much appreciate the assistance Attached please find my resume and cover letter As I had mentioned I am pursuing an opportunity in maintenanceoperations in the cogeneration or power generation industry here in Houston My cover letter outlines my interests and abilities in greater detail If theres anything I can do for you please ask Thank you John Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at RESUME JOHN E MCKINLEY doc COVER LETTER ENRON JASON SOKOLOVdoc
